52509.「お待たせしました 女王様！\n 魔人召喚の儀式 準備できましたわ！:
We've been waiting for you! The ritual to
summon the genie is ready!

52510.「おい みんな！\n オレたちの願いを かなえてくれる\n 伝説の魔人が とうと:
Listen, everyone! The legendary genie who
will grant our wish is finally gonna appear!!

52511.「この町を デッカイお城にして\n オレたちが 好きなだけ遊んで暮らせる\n 夢:
We're going to turn this town into a big
castle and build a kingdom just for kids where
we can live and play as much as we want!

52513.「リズ！ 考え直せ！\n 子供王国なんて 作って それから\n お前は どうする:
Liz! Think about it! What are you going to do
after you create this kingdom for children?

52514.「これからもずっと 大人の代わりに\n ひとりで 責任を背負っていくのか？\n:
Are you going to keep taking on responsibility
alone instead of an adult? Is that what you
really want?!

52515.「しつこいぞ フィーロ！\n 女王様は オレたち みんなのことを考えて\n 自由:
You really are persistent, Firo! But, our
queen is thinking of all of us, and wants to
give everyone a life of freedom!

52516.「大人たちなんか いなくても\n 魔人のチカラさえあれば\n アタシたちは 好き:
As long as we have the genie's power, we can
live however we want without any adults!

52517.「……フィーロ。\n 私は みんなが幸せになれる道を 選びたいの。\n あなたは:
Firo... I want to choose a path that will make
everyone happy. Just keep your mouth shut.

52519.「……我 汝を呼び 汝に命ず。\n いにしえより セレドの地に封じられし魔人よ\:
I call upon and command thee. Genie that has been sealed in the land of Celed since time immemorial, awaken from your eternal slumber
and show yourself to me!

52521.「……我は 魔人エンラージャ。\n 我が魂を呼び覚ませし 人の子よ。\n 契約に:
I am the genie, Enraja... You have awakened
my soul, child of man. I shall obey our
covenant and grant thee thy wish...

52523.「……この セレドの町を\n 大人たちがいた 元の姿に戻して！:
I wish you to return this town back to the
way it was when the adults were here!

52524.「パパとママに 会わせて……！！: I want to see my mom and dad!

52526.「くっ……ぷフッ。\n ああーーーっはっはっはっハ！:
P-Pffft....
Oooooh ho ho ho ho!!

52527.「引っかかっターーー！ バカな小娘ですネ～♪\n ガキんちょの願いなんて 知った:
Looks like ya got me! I don't care about the
stupid wishes of a little girl, because ya
never had a fiend like me!

52529.「何よ この無礼者は！\n いったい どうなっているの！？\n ムッチーノ！ 説:
What is the meaning of this?! Why is he so
rude?! Muccino! Explain yourself!

52530.「……ご主人様の御心は ワタクシめの心。: The master's will is mine own will...

52531.「偉大なる 魔人エンラージャ様は たかが人間の\n 小娘の命令など お聞きになら:
The great genie Enraja does not take orders
from a mere human girl. Do you understand
now?

52532.「ンホホホホ ご苦労でした ムッチ～ノ♪\n どうやら うまく ガキんちょを手玉:
YO! My man! Thank ya for breakin' my seal!
Ya played that little brat just like that!

52533.「ムッチーノ…… あなた……。\n 私たちを 利用していたのね！\n おとなしく:
Muccino... this whole time... you've just been
using us! You even pretended to be my
servant...

52534.「あーーったりまえだろ！\n そうでなきゃ 誰が お前みたいな\n タカビー女の:
Of COURSE I did! Who would seriously listen
to a spoiled little brat like you?!

52535.「オレのご主人様は エンラージャ様ただひとり！\n お前らは しょせん このお方:
Enraja is my only master! You are all just
tools to aid in his resurrection!

52536.「……そういえば 私 封印から目覚めたら\n このセレドの地に 魔人エンラージャ:
That reminds me... I was thinkin' that I'd get
around to makin' my OWN country in these
parts. That seal was no fun, you know...

52537.「子供たちが みんな私にかしずく 夢の王国♪\n ああっ……ス・テ・キ<hear:
All the kids servin' me food and booze, my
own kingdom of dreams where I never lose!

52538.「お前たちには その王国のために\n たっぷり 働いてもらうと しましょうかア！:
I'll make sure you slave for the wave I'm
about to engrave!

52541.「おやおや…… おびえることは ありませんヨ♪\n バカで 素直で 扱いやすい子:
Mr. Firo, sir! I am not your maitre d'! Cuz
all you kids are gonna serve a fiend like me!

52543.「そこのアナタは 別ですヨ！\n したたかで 扱いにくい大人は\n 生かしておく:
Over there, the big adult in the room!
You're about to know the meaning of doom!

52544.「さあ いきますヨ ムッチーノ♪\n ジャマな大人の ブチのめしタ～イム！！:
Let's go, Muccino, my man! Let's toss this
filthy adult out of this laaaaand!

52549.「ここは 子供だけの町ですわ。\n 大人の助けは いりません。:
This town's for children only. We don't need
the help of any adults.

52550.「仕える主君を求め 迷える執事よ……。: A steward, lost without a master to serve...

52551.「絶対なる契約のもと 我が呼び声に応えよ！: Under an unbreakable contract, answer my call!

52552.「いかがあそばされましたか 女王様？: My queen... how may I serve you?

52553.「ムッチーノ あのザコを排除なさい。\n 私の大事な国民を 襲おうとしたわ！:
Get rid of that thing, Muccino. He tried
attacking our helpless citizens!

52555.「女王様の御心は ワタクシめの心。\n 怒りの調べを……その身体で聴くがいい！:
The queen's will is mine own will. Listen
to the notes of my anger!

52557.「遅い！ あんなザコ\n 私が まばたきしている間に 片付けなさい！:
You took too long! Now hurry up and clean up
that mess!

52558.「まことに申し訳ございません 女王様。\n この失態は ワタクシの不徳のいたすと:
I am truly sorry, my queen. This failure is
the result of my own negligence. I failed to
meet your expectations. Muccino regrets.

52559.「それより そこのあなた……。\n 見たところ 大人の方のようですわね。\n 私:
More importantly... hey, you. You look like
an adult. I can tell.

52560.「おい……なんだよ アイツ。: Hey... who the heck is that?

52562.「どこから わいてきたのか 存じませんが……\n ここは 子供だけの町 セレドで:
I don't know where you came from, but this is
the town called Celed. Only children are
allowed to stay here.

52563.「あなたのような大人が この町で過ごすには\n それ相応の 審査が必要ですの。\:
As an adult, you need to be tested before
you're allowed to stay here. Come to the
High Church later.

52564.「あなたも さっさと来なさい ムッチーノ。: You too, Muccino. Get over here.

52565.「女王様の御心は ワタクシめの心。\n すべては 女王様の おおせのままに……。:
The queen's will is mine own will. Everything 
is as she wills it...

52566.「私の言いつけ通り 審査を通過してきたようね。\n いいわ。これからは あなたの:
Looks like you passed the test. Good job. From
now on, you are hereby recognized as an
honorary child.

52567.「いらっしゃい 旅の方。\n 私は この町の指導者 リゼロッタ。\n 国民たちか:
Welcome, traveler. My name is Lieselotte, the
leader of this town. Its citizens call me
their queen.

52568.「あなたは…… そう <pc>というの。\n あはっ。変わったお名前ですこと。\:
And you are...? <pc>, I see.
Ha. That's a pretty weird name for someone
with a frog for a face.

52569.「……それで？\n あなた いったい どこから\n なんのために この町へいらし:
So..? Where in the world did you come from
and why did you come here?

52571.「そう…… 蝶を探しに……。: I see... you're looking for butterflies...

52572.「……ふうん。まあ いいわ。\n それじゃ この町のルールを教えてあげる。\n:
...Hmm. Well, okay. I'll tell you the rules of
this town. I'm only going to say them once, so
listen carefully.

52573.「まず ひとつめ。子供の言うことは 絶対。\n 名誉子供は 子供の言葉に従って\:
First thing. What the children say is
absolute. You must honor them by obeying their
words and not causing trouble.

52574.「そして ふたつめ。\n どんな時でも 戸じまりは\n ちゃんとすること。:
Second thing. You must keep the door closed
at all times.

52575.「最後に みっつめ。\n 名誉子供は おやつ抜き。:
And last thing. No snacks allowed for
honorary children.

52576.「あと ムッチーノは 私の執事だから\n 倒したりしちゃ ダメよ。:
Also, Muccino is my butler. So don't go
beating him up.

52577.「私からは それくらいね。\n あなたのカエル顔も 見飽きたから\n そろそろ:
I think that's everything. Anyways, I'm tired
of looking at your froggy face, so I think
it's time for you to leave.

52578.「ねえ 女王様～。お話が終わったんなら\n おやつに しようよ～！:
Hey, queen! If you're all done, let's have
some snacks!

52579.「あたし こないだ 出してもらった\n すごいケーキが また たべた～い！:
I want to eat that amazing cake from last
time!

52580.「あら。そういえば おやつの時間だったわね。\n じゃあ 支度してくるから みん:
Looks like it's snack time. Everyone, come to
the tea room on the second floor in a little
while.

52582.「女王様の御心は ワタクシめの心。\n すべては 女王様の おおせのままに……。:
The queen's will is mine own will. Everything 
is as she wills it...

52584.「名誉子供は おやつ抜き……\n 覚えてるわよね？\n 来るのは勝手だけど あな:
Honorary children don't get snacks, remember?
You're welcome to come, but no snacks for
you. Got it?

52585.「みんな 席についたわね。\n それじゃ 始めるわよ。:
Everyone's in their seats, so let's get
started.

52586.「ほら ムッチーノ。\n いつものアレ…… さっさと なさい。: Hey, Muccino. I want the usual. Chop chop.

52587.「女王様の望みは ワタクシめの望み……。\n 甘き調べを しばし お楽しみくださ:
The queen's desires are my own desires...
Please enjoy my sweet music.

52588.「どう？ あなた こんなおやつの山\n 見たことないでしょう？ ムッチーノがいれ:
Well? Never seen a bunch of snacks like this
before, have you? Muccino lets us eat whatever
we want, whenever we want.

52589.「……ま。しょせん 名誉子供のあなたに\n あげる分は ないけれど。:
There's not enough here to give some to an
honorary child... oh well...

52592.「ちょっと ムッチーノ！\n あたし プクプクピーチの\n ケーキがたべたいって:
Hey, Muccino! I said I wanted Muccino Peach
flavor cake!

52593.「オイラ こんなんじゃ 足りないよォ！\n お砂糖が いっぱい かかったドーナツ:
Wow, this is great! Gimmie a big pile of
donuts filled with sugar!

52594.「はい かしこまりました！\n お嬢様 お坊ちゃま ただいま……。: Yes, of course! Miss... Sir... here you are...

52595.「……こ こんな\n 使い魔のチカラに 頼りきった生活\n 本当に 大丈夫なんで:
I wonder if it's really safe to be relying so
much on that familiar's power...

52596.「……以前は この町にも 大人がいて\n ちゃんとした暮らしを していたんです。:
There used to be adults in this town and we
all lived normal lives. But now...

52598.「……みんなで 神殿に 行ってみないか？ \n 昔みたいに お祈りすれば きっと:
...why don't we all go to the temple? If we
pray like we used to, I'm sure that all of
the grown-ups will come back.

52599.「大人なんて 戻ってこなくていいさ。\n オレたちには 女王様がいるからな。:
We don't need them anymore. We have our queen
now.

52600.「アタシたちは アンタみたいに弱虫じゃないの。\n そんなに お祈りしたければ:
We're not wimps like you. If you want to pray
so badly, why don't you just go by yourself?

52603.「そろそろ おやつの時間も おひらきね。\n それじゃ私は 出かける支度をしてく:
Snack time's over. I'm gonna go get ready to
head out now.

52604.「……ということは いよいよ\n 例の計画を 再開するんですね 女王様！:
So... you're finally going to resume your
little plan, my queen?

52605.「ええ。ドラゴンのしっぽも 用意できたことだし\n そろそろ 最後の仕上げに移る:
Yeah. Now that we have the Green Dragon Tail,
we can go ahead with the finishing touches.
You guys, hurry up and get ready.

52606.「私は 部屋に戻るから\n あなたたちは １階で待っててちょうだい。\n ムッチ:
I'm going back to my room. You guys wait for
me on the first floor. Muccino, you can take a
break too.

52607.「女王様の御心は ワタクシめの心。\n すべては 女王様の おおせのままに……。:
The queen's will is mine own will. Everything 
is as she wills it...

52608.「今のセレドの町は 子供しかいないけれど\n 以前は いつも えらそうにしてる\:
Celed is full of just kids now, but it used to
be filled with loud and annoying adults.

52609.「この教会は もう取り壊す予定だからって\n 立ち入り禁止に なっていてね。\n:
This church was off limits because it was
gonna be torn down. It was our playground.

52610.「屋根の上で オニごっこをしたり\n 注意に来た大人を 穴に落としたり……。\n:
We played tag on the roof, and the adults that
came to warn us fell into holes... it was
always so funny watching them get worked up.

52611.「……私が 家の書庫で 古くから禁じられていた\n 召喚術の本と 魔法の指輪を見:
But once I found a book on an ancient
forbidden art of summoning and this magic
ring, I got tired of playing those games...

52612.「最初は 召喚術なんて信じてなかったの。\n ただ 禁術に手を染めるっていう 新:
I didn't believe in it at first. But the
excitement in playing with these forbidden
arts had everyone excited, even me.

52615.「ムッチーノは 私が召喚者と知ると\n 女王様と呼んで 忠誠を誓ったわ。\n そ:
When Muccino found out I was his summoner, he
called me his queen and swore his allegiance
to me. And he told me something fascinating.

52616.「この地には 伝説の魔人が 封印されていて\n 魔人を召喚した者は どんな願いで:
A legendary genie is sealed in this land, and
the person who summons it will be granted a
single wish, he said...

52617.「そこで 私たちは この教会で\n こっそり 魔人召喚の儀式を やってみたの。\:
So, we secretly performed the summoning ritual
here in this church. We made do with the
ingredients we already had.

52618.「ドラゴンのしっぽは トカゲのしっぽ\n 黒ヤギの生き血は トマトソース\n こ:
The Green Dragon Tail was a lizard's tail, the
Black Goat Blood was tomato sauce, and the
Amber Jewel was my mom's necklace.

52619.「そして 召喚の儀式を始めた時……\n 魔法陣が激しく光って 地響きが起きたの。:
And when the ritual started... a magic circle
glowed so brightly and everything shook. I
thought the church was gonna collapse.

52620.「結局 魔人は現れなかったけれど……\n 教会の外に出てみたら 町の大人たちは\:
The genie never did appear, but... when we
walked outside, we realized that all of the
adults in town were gone!

52621.「不完全な材料を使ったため 召喚は失敗し\n 暴走した魔力が 大人たちを消し去っ:
The ritual failed because we used the wrong
ingredients, and the magic went haywire and
made the adults disappear, Muccino said.

52622.「魔人に 願いをかなえてもらうことも\n できなかった上 まさか 町の大人たちが:
I wasn't expecting to have my wishes granted,
but... I never expected every single adult in
town to just disappear.

52623.「……でも あんな うるさいヤツら\n いなくなって せいせいしたわ。\n いつ:
But... I am glad we don't have any annoying
adults anymore. I was so tired of their
constant bickering.

52624.「この町に 大人がいない理由も\n 私が この町の指導者をしている理由も\n こ:
Now you know exactly why there are no adults
in this town, and why I am the queen, right?

52625.「さあ 話は終わりよ。\n 私はこれから 大事な用があるから\n 出ていってちょ:
I'm finished here. I have some important
matters to attend to, so I have to ask you
to leave.

52626.<if_woman>「ちょっと おばさん ジャマだよ！<else>「ちょっと お:
<if_woman> Hey, old hag! Move it!
<else>Hey, old geezer! Move it! <endif>

52628.「私が 帰ってくるまで\n 戸じまりに 気をつけて\n みんな いい子で待ってる:
Be good until I get back. Don't forget to keep
the door closed.

52629.「はーい！\n 女王様 いってらっしゃい！: Right! We'll be waiting, your highness!

52632.「リズ あの塔には 決して近寄るなって\n いつも 大人たちが言っていたじゃない:
The adults told us never to go near that
tower, Liz. It's too dangerous. You can't go!

52633.「……フィーロ。いつ 誰が\n 私に意見しろって言ったのかしら？: Firo... nobody asked for your opinion.

52634.「そうだ。お前みたいなヤツが\n 女王様に意見するなんて おこがましいぞ。\n:
That's right. It's rude for a wimp like you
to be giving opinions to our queen. Now, be
a good little boy and get lost.

52638.「……ぼ 僕 フィーロっていいます。\n なんだか 情けないところを\n 見られ:
M-my name's Firo, and... you probably think
I'm pretty pathetic... ha...

52639.「<pc>さん リズは……リゼロッタは\n 以前に失敗した 魔人召喚の儀式を\n:
Liz- I mean, Lieselotte is trying to summon
a genie after failing the first time.

52640.「彼女は そのために\n 儀式に必要な こはくの宝珠があるという \n リンジャ:
She went to the Linja Tower to do it, and it
requires the Amber Jewel.

52641.「……でも 大人たちは\n リンジャの塔には 決して近づいてはいけないと\n い:
...but the adults always told us never to go
near Linja Tower.

52642.「……<pc>さん。\n 旅の方に こんなことを頼むのは\n 気が引けるのですが:
...<pc>. I hate to ask this of a
traveler, but I have a favor to ask you.

52643.「僕は このまま リズを放っておけません。\n どうか 彼女を止めるために\n:
I can't leave Liz like this. Please, will you
come with me to Linja's Tower to stop her?<yesno><close>

52644.「そ そんな……お願いです！ どうか\n リンジャの塔まで 一緒に来てくれません:
N-no... please! I'm begging you! You're the
only adult that I can rely on!<yesno><close>

52645.「ありがとうございます。リンジャの塔は \n セレドット山道に出て 山道を北に進:
Thank you so much. To get to Linja Tower, you
must go north from Celedot Mountain Pass,
then north through the Linjahar Coast Ruins.

52646.「僕は 先に向かいますので\n <pc>さんも 後から来てください。\n 塔の入:
I'll start heading there now. When you can
come, please meet me at the tower's entrance.

52648.「リズを止めるために ここまで来ましたが\n いざ こうして 塔を目の前にすると:
I came all the way here to stop Liz, but when
I looked up and saw this tower, I got so
nervous... I really am pathetic.

52649.「……僕のお父さんは 町の神父だったんです。\n この塔には 絶対に入ってはいけ:
My father was the town priest. He had strictly
forbidden me from going anywhere near this
tower...

52650.「神に仕える僕が 教えに背くなんて……。\n お父さんが知ったら どう思うでしょ:
How can I disobey his teachings...? I wonder
what he would think if he knew I was here.

52651.「……あの 古い教会で 遊ぶようになるまでは\n みんな 大人の教えを守る\n:
All of the kids were earnest and followed the
teachings of the adults... until they started
playing in that old church.

52652.「毎日 ダーマ神殿に行って お祈りをして\n 鐘が鳴ると 大人たちが迎えに来てく:
Every day we would go to Alltrades Abbey and
pray... When the bell rang, the adults would
come to get us... Everyone lived peacefully.

52653.「今は <pc>さんだけが 頼りです。\n 大人がいない今 誰かが彼女を止めない:
You're the only one I can count on now that
the adults are all gone. Come on, we have to
stop her.

52654.「やっと 見つけたわ……。\n これさえあれば……。:
I finally found it... If only I had this
last time...

52656.「……フィーロ！\n また ジャマしようっていうの？\n 大人まで連れてきて ど:
Firo! Are you trying to get in my way again?
And what do you think you're doing, bringing
an adult in here?!

52657.「リ……リズを止めるために 決まってるだろ！\n もう 魔人の召喚なんて\n 危:
O-of course! We're here to stop you, Liz!
You can't take the risk of summoning a genie
anymore!

52658.「……ねえ 旅の方。\n あなた 蝶を探しているとか 言っていたわね。:
Hey, traveler... you said you were looking
for butterflies, right?

52660.「悪いけど この こはくの宝珠は\n 先に手にした 私のものよ。\n あはっ。残:
Unfortunate for you, but this Amber Jewel
belongs to me. I got it first. Ha-ha. Too
bad for you, huh?

52661.「これを使って 伝説の魔人を呼び出し\n 願いをかなえてもらうのよ。:
I'm going to use it to summon a legendary
genie to grant me a wish.

52662.「あのセレドの町を キレイなお城にして\n 子供たちが 毎日楽しく暮らせるような:
I'm going to turn Celed into a beautiful
castle, and build a kingdom where children
can live happily ever after. Isn't it amazing?

52663.「リズ……お前は……。\n 大人が禁じていた 召喚術に手を染めてまで\n いった:
Liz, you... I really was wondering what you
hoped to accomplish by resorting to something
the adults forbade us from...

52664.「そんな くだらない願いを かなえるのが\n お前の望みだったのか？\n 大人た:
That's what you really wanted, your stupid
wish? You don't want the adults to come back?!

52665.「大人 大人って うるさいわね……。: Adults this, adults that... how annoying...

52666.「魔人のチカラを使えば 大人がいた時より\n よっぽどいい生活が できるのよ！:
With the genie's power, we can have a much
better life than we did with adults around!

52667.「大人なんて……私たちには いらないの！！: We... we don't need adults anymore!

52668.「さあ ボサッとしてないで 行くわよ！\n こはくの宝珠が 手に入ったから\n:
Hey, stop standing around and get moving! Now
that we have the jewel, let's go back to town
and start the summoning ritual!

52669.「女王様の御心は ワタクシめの心。\n ……これで ご主人様の願いが かないます:
The will of my queen is mine own will.
Now the master's wish will come true...

52671.「……僕は 今まで 彼女の暴走を止めることだけ\n 考えていました。でも 教えに:
All I had on my mind was stopping her from
running off... but when I conquered my fear of
climbing this tower, I realized something.

52672.「僕は ひとりで 責任を抱えようとするリズを\n 助けたかったんだ……って。:
I wanted to help her. She was trying to take
on all of the responsibility herself.

52673.「……すみません 僕も彼女を追います。\n <pc>さん ありがとうございました:
Sorry, I'm going to go after her too.
Thank you so much, <pc>.

52675.「これだから 大人はキライなんですヨ！\n 次は 戻ってこられないようニ\n 魂:
This is why I hate adults! Next time, let's
crush their souls so they can't come back!

52676.「あびゃッ……やっと 目覚めたのニ\n こんな所で 人間にやられるなんテ……。\:
I can't believe I finally woke up, just to
get beat up.... by an adult who's a total
schmuck!

52677.「チッ チクショー……。\n これまで さんざんガマンして ガキどもに\n コキ:
D-damn it... I went through so much only to
be defeated by a bunch of snot nosed brats...

52679.「<pc>さん！ 大丈夫ですか？\n ムッチーノは…… 魔人は……\n あいつら:
Are you okay, <pc>?!
What happened to Muccino... and the genie...?

52680.「もしかして……。\n あなたが 倒してくれたんですか！？<yesno><clo: Could it be... you beat them?<yesno><close>

52681.「いいえ 僕には わかります。\n さっきまで この教会に ただよっていた\n:
No, I can already tell. The foul air that
was in the church is now gone...

52682.「やっぱり そうなんですね。\n さっきまで この教会に ただよっていた\n ま:
I guess you really did, huh? The foul air in
this church seems to have disappeared...

52684.「使い魔や 魔人には 裏切られて\n 大人たちも いない……。\n 私たち これ:
That familiar and genie betrayed us, and the
adults are still gone... What are we supposed
to do now...?

52686.「……なあ みんな 覚えているか？\n 僕らが ダーマ神殿で お祈りしていると\:
Hey, don't you remember? Whenever we prayed at
the Alltrades Abbey, the adults would come and
get us after...

52687.「ダーマ神殿か……。そういえば\n いつも お祈りが済んで 鐘が鳴る頃に\n 大:
Alltrades Abbey...? I remember they always
used to come and get us after we finished
praying and the bell started ringing...

52688.「あたし……ママに あいたい。: I... I want to see my mom...

52689.「みんなで ダーマ神殿に行ってみよう。\n 昔のように あそこで お祈りしていれ:
Let's all go to Alltrades Abbey. I have a
feeling that if we pray there like we used
to... we'll see the adults again.

52691.「……そうだ！\n <pc>さんも 一緒に来てください。\n その方が みんな安:
Right! <pc>, please come with
us too. I think it will make everyone feel
safer if you're around.

52692.「ダーマ神殿は 町の北側から出て\n 山道を登った先にあります。\n ３階の礼拝:
Alltrades Abbey is just up the mountain path
from the north side of town. We'll be in the
chapel on the third floor.

52693.「来てくれたんですね <pc>さん。\n ちょうど お祈りを始めるところでした。:
Ah, there you are, <pc>.
We were just about to start praying.

52694.「……セレドの町の 大人たちは\n 今も どこかで 心配して\n 僕たちを探して:
The adults must still be out there somewhere,
desperately searching for us.

52695.「ここで お祈りをしていれば\n いつも通り 鐘が鳴って 大人たちが\n 迎えに:
I believe that if we stay here and pray, the
bell will ring as it usually does and the
adults will come here for us.

52696.「さあ みんな お祈りを始めよう。: Come on, everyone. Let's start praying.

52697.「いにしえより セレドの民を守りし神よ……。\n どうか 教えに背いた\n 我ら:
We pray to you, oh Almighty One, protector
of Celed... Forgive us for our sins of defying
your teachings...

52698.「正しき道を見失い 迷える子羊たちに\n かつての平穏を もたらしたまえ……。:
Bring peace back to the lost lambs who cannot
find their way...

52703.「やっぱり 大人たちは\n もう 帰ってこないのね……。:
I guess the adults really aren't coming
back...

52704.「みんな 期待させておいて ごめん……。: Sorry to get your hopes up, everyone...

52705.「フィーロ あなたは 何も悪くないわ。\n 本当に謝らなければいけないのは 私よ:
You didn't do anything wrong, Firo. It's me
who should be apologizing to you.

52706.「私のせいで こんなことになってしまい\n 責任を感じて ずっと ひとりで\n:
I feel responsible for what happened, and I've
been trying to handle it myself this whole
time, but...

52707.「……でも それが間違いだったと 気付いたの。\n 私はもっと みんなを信じるべ:
But I realized that was a mistake. I should
have trusted everyone more.

52708.「この先 大変な思いをするだろうけど……\n これからは 使い魔に頼らず\n 自:
The future is gonna be hard... but from now
on, let's live with our own power, and not
have to rely on a familiar anymore.

52709.「……フィーロ もちろん あなたも\n 手助けしてくれるわよね？: Of course you'll help me... won't you, Firo?

52711.「あなたには さんざん失礼な事をしたのに\n 私や 子供たちを助けてくれて\n:
I don't know how I can thank you for helping
all of us when we've been so mean to you...

52712.「……たしか 蝶をお探しでしたわね。\n せめてものお礼に どうか\n この こ:
You were looking for butterflies, right?
Then, as a token of my thanks, I want you
to take this Amber Jewel.

52714.「<pc>さん。\n 何から何まで あなたに頼ってしまって\n 本当に すみませ:
I apologize for having to rely on you for
everything, <pc>.

52715.「これからは みんなで 支え合って\n なんとか 暮らしていきます。:
From now on, we will all support each other
and find a way to live together.

52716.「いつか 名誉子供も おやつが食べられる\n ステキな町に してみせますわ。\n:
One day, I'll make this town a nice place
where even honorary children are allowed
snacks. Come on, Firo. Let's go.
